725456f-a.title: Queens: 55th Drive - 56th Street
725456f-a.text:
55th Drive, north side, between 58th Street (right) and 56th
Street (left). Note that 55th Drive when constructed will be in
the foreground along the fence. This is the Underhill Covert house.
It is said that this house is on the site of or near that of the
Pole's house of 1700. The farm was owned by John Dennian. His heirs
sold it in 1717 to Richard Hallet, and from his heirs, Tunis Schenck and
John R. Schenck purchased it. Subsequently Underhill Covert was the
owner. Several of the old barns date back to the early 18th Century.
One of the barns is said to be the original homestead of John Dennian
who located here in 1662. The occupants bearing the Covert name were
nderhill.1852 to 1860; C.G.,1873; and H., in 1891. The house was
demolished in 1931.
March 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

725457f-a.title: Queens: 55th Drive - 56th Street
725457f-a.text:
55th Drive, north side, between 56th Street (left)
and 58th Street (right) showirc two views of the Underhill
Cooert farmhouse and out buildings rf 1852. See other views
for more data.
1922
Viww 2: March 1926.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

725459f-b.title: Queens: 55th Drive - 56th Street
725459f-b.text:
55th Drive (foreground, along line of fence), north side, between
58th Street (right) and 56th Street (left), showing the Nicholas Covert
house and outbuilding. Full data on other views. This is a set of
four views taken on different occasions and from slightly diffent angles.
March 1923.
Views 2 \& 3: 1922.
View 4: September 1929.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

725460f-a.title: Queens: 55th Drive - 56th Street
725460f-a.text:
55th Drive, north side, between 58th Street (right) and 56th Street
(left). 55th Drive is to the left of these buildings and is not seen in
this view. This is a set of two views of the Underhill Covert farmhouse
(background) and outbuildings,showing a front and rear view.
March 1925.
View 2: 1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

725462f-a.title: Queens: 55th Drive - 56th Street
725462f-a.text:
55th Road, south side (along the foreground to be constructed)
between 5Sth Street (left, not shown) and 56th Street, showing a south-
west view of the Underhill Covert farmhouse and out buildings. The
Calvary Cemetery Corporation were the owners of this property in 1929.
1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
